name: Water Slide: Ultimate Adventur
description:
Water Slide: Ultimate Adventure is top ranked realistic 3D simulated game for you. feel the realistic sliding experience in a big sliding curvy water-splash park. Ride your way through a fresh water dangerous slide and chase the adrenaline rush as you twist and tilt your way around tight corners. Dive into the seep water while sliding down from top to the ground level pool. Choose the right track and Slide through tubes with lots of real and amazing 3D experience to complete the level.

Main FEATURES:
• Easy to control and move Left-Right.
• Realistic 3D water Surfing Environment.
• Different camera modes to enjoy every direction.
• High quality, immersive visuals realistic environment.
• Enjoy the extreme slider with different camera views.
• Multiple challenging 3D slides game levels to enjoy.
• Extreme water park thrills with 3D water slider.
